snippet.title: Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes | Launch Trailer [North America]
snippet.description:
The award-winning Might & Magic Clash of Heroes is back, and available now on XBLA and PSN! Live the epic adventure of 5 young Heroes leading their armies to save the world of Might & Magic. Enjoy a 20 hour campaign in the rich Might & Magic universe and learn devastating combos!

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mightandmagic
